title.rendered: Estates Gazette reports: Alvarium launches investment platform in France

excerpt.rendered: Alvarium has teamed up with asset manager Osesam to launch a platform to invest $100m (£79m) a year in France. It will commit between $5m to $50m per deal, alongside co-investment from private and institutional clients, targeting mainly residential assets valued up to $200m.
